March with the ACLU at the MLK Day parade on Monday, January 21!

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

The ACLU-DC will be marching in the 38th annual Martin Luther King Jr. Peace Walk and Parade on Monday, January 21 and we'd love for you to join our contingent!

March with the ACLU on MLK Day!

Show your support and meet other local activists fighting to ensure free speech, equal rights, and other civil liberties in the District.

Monday, January 21, 10:30 a.m. - 3 p.m.
Anacostia Arts Center
1231 Good Hope Rd SE
Washington, DC 20020

We'll be assembling at 10:30 a.m. at the Anacostia Arts. The parade steps off at 11:30 a.m. and will conclude at the RISE Center at St. Elizabeth's Pavilion.
RSVP TODAY

The more the merrier! We hope to see you there!

Monica Hopkins
Executive Director, ACLU of the District of Columbia
